title: Traversal Control
subtitle: Controlling the navigation path through the app.
plainText: Now that we have our core components, it's time to manage them.
This section is all about controlling the user's journey. We'll learn how to create boundaries with `FocusScope` and define explicit navigation rules with `FocusTraversalPolicy`.
Mastering these tools is the key to creating a predictable and intuitive ten-foot experience.
